item.title: Engine Error
item.dc:creator: lexa2
item.description:
Known bug that had been reported several (dozens, if not more) times.
Thanks for reporting it anyways as it is important to know all places and maps where this bug could be hit. You could switch model details to “Medium” or “Low” in the gfx setting dialog as a way to workaround this bug, it would lower the overall amount of vertexes game engine has to process each frame making it less probable to hit vertex buffer overflow.

item.title: Engine Error
item.dc:creator: maxximo
item.description:
Bcd_XD:

I was at one of the first chapters, trying to get the “arternative-way-at-office” (i don’t know how to translate it properly) archivement (may be bm_c1a2c map?). I was inside the turret place looking down at the headcrabs, trying to kill them before get down.

And it was only one time. The next time i passed through there, i did it faster than previous one. And there’s no error.

My PC: Asus Sabertooth 990FX + AMD FX8150 + AMD HD6870 + 8GB DDR3 1333 (2x4GB )

siempre que juegas la primera vez un juego de la Source Engine, tiene las “sobrecargas” de archivos, porque no sabe cuanta memoria tendra que usar, una vez que pasas la etapa, qieda algo asi como un “registro” de cuanta memoria necesita, es lo mismo que cuando tratas de cambiar la resolucion a un juego de Source Engine y se congela y cuando vuelves a encenderlo, la resolucion esta cambiada.
